### Volcano plot

```{r volcano, echo = F, warning = F, out.width="100%"}
b <- result_ids %>%
  mutate(significant = dplyr::case_when(padj < fdr ~ "yes", TRUE ~ "no"))

p <- b %>%
  ggplot2::ggplot(
    aes(
      x = log2FoldChange,
      y = -log10(pvalue),
      color = significant,
      text = SYMBOL
    )
  ) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(x = "Log 2 Fold Change", y = "-log10(p-value)") +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("grey80", viridis(1)))

plotly::ggplotly(p, tooltip = "text") %>% toWebGL()
```
